Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan started their Super 4 journey in Asia Cup 2022 with a win against India by 5 wickets, pushing their NRR to +0.126 in the points table.
Afghanistan on the other hand started their Super 4 stage with a loss against Sri Lanka after remaining unbeaten in the group stage.
Others: Mohammad Rizwan is currently the top scorer in the ongoing Asia Cup with 192 runs to his name in 3 matches, averaging 96 while striking at 128.00.
Spinner Mujeeb Ur Rahman has been the top wicket-taker in the tournament with 7 wickets to his name.
